action.action-desc: Mr. Balderson (for himself and Mr. Pfluger) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To nullify certain interagency guidance related to climate-related financial risk management for large financial institutions.

section.text: The final interagency guidance issued by the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System, the Comptroller of the Currency, and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation titled Principles for Climate-Related Financial Risk Management for Large Financial Institutions (published October 24, 2023) shall have no force or effect and such agencies may not issue any substantially similar guidance.
